verses.text:
I hear the Savior say, "Come to me, come to me,
And I will give thee rest, And I will give thee rest;"
I hear the Savior say, "Come to me, come to me,
And I will give thee rest.

I come to thee, O Lord, I come to thee, O Lord,
Thou wilt receive me now, Thou wilt receive me now;
I come to thee, O Lord, I come to thee, O Lord,
Thou wilt receive me now.

My guilty conscience feels, My guilty conscience feels,
That thou dost pardon me, That thou dost pardon me;
My guilty conscience feels, My guilty conscience feels,
That thou dost pardon me.
